text: I feel at home in the world of software development. Over the past 6 years, I have worked in the DER Touristik Group with a focus on backend development. There I was able to gain a lot of experience with Kotlin, Spring Boot, various databases, Kubernetes, AWS, Docker and much more. I will go into more detail on the "Projects" page.

In my private life i'm also focused on my goals mainly in sports. Through hard work and dedication, I won the German downhill championship title on my longboard in 2018 and three years later, after switching to road biking, i became runner-up in the Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg criterium championship in 2021.

I have now retired from active racing and in my free time I mainly enjoy the outdoors in my new home in the north of Frankfurt. At the weekend, I usually spend my time off work in the Taunus or relaxing with my girlfriend.
